Greenville.Greenville Memorial Hospital: Greenville Memorial Hospital is an 995-bed tertiary referral hospital and academic center located at 701 Grove Road, Greenville, South Carolina. Greenville Memorial Hospital, which is the largest hospital in South Carolina, serves as the regional referral center for the upstate area. It also serves as the flagship hospital for Greenville Health System, a not-for-profit academic health organization engaged in medical research and education.
